r.s: A query cache plugin for mysqlnd
r.d: The mysqlnd query result cache plugin is a mysqlnd plugin. It adds basic client side result set caching to all PHP MySQL extensions (ext/mysql, ext/mysqli, PDO_MySQL). if they are compiled to use mysqlnd. It does not change the API of the MySQL extensions and thus it operates virtually transparent for applications."
r.n: Fixed config.m4 to fix build on modern Linux distributions like Ubuntu.
